Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rename skill from generating-frontend-styleguides to frontend-styleguide

- Renamed directory from skills/generating-frontend-styleguides to skills/frontend-styleguide
- Updated YAML frontmatter name in SKILL.md
- Updated all references in .claude/CLAUDE.md
- Updated all references in README.md \(installation instructions and examples\)

This shorter name is more concise and follows standard skill naming conventions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
